title: Jain Temple’s Model Viral as 3D Animation of Ram Mandir in Ayodhya
subtitle: Fact Check of Model of Ram Temple in Ayodhya: A 3D animation video of a temple has gone viral on social media as the model for the upcoming Ram Mandir in Ayodhya, ahead of the Bhoomi Pujan.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A 3D animation video of a temple has gone viral on social media as the model for the upcoming Ram Mandir in Ayodhya, ahead of the Bhoomi Pujan ceremony on 5 August.

The video is, however, old and actually a virtual rendition of a Jain temple made by an architecture visualisation studio.
